title: 多睇戲，少打機嘅list，請評價

replies.msg:
唔多打機, 但會用黎睇戲 (包括4k mkv), 所以揀AMD嘅display card, 請問以下list有冇需要執, 駛唔駛加到16GB ram? 謝謝!

AMD, Ryzen5 2600, 3.9GHz with Boost, 6 Cores/12 Threads UNLOCKED, 3MB/16MB Caches, AM4, Wraith Spire Cooler, 65W TDP, YD2600BBAFBOX $1365
ASRock B450M PRO4, B450, MATX, AM4, 4*DDR4,, $670
SAPPHIRE, AMD, RX 570 PULSE ( ITX ) V1, 4GB GDDR5 $1099
ADATA Premier 8GB (1 x 8GB) DDR4-2666(AD4U266638G19-R) $368
WD Red 2TB SATA3 NAS Hard Drives (WD20EFRX / 64MB Cache / IntelliPower)(紅版) $540
M.2 256GB ADATA SX8200 Pro PCIe3x4 SSD $525
Cooler Master MWE Gold 550/550W ATX Fully Modular PowerSupply,5 Years Warranty (80PLUS GOLD)(MPY-5501-AFAAG-UK) $629
Antec DP301m Tempered Glass Micro-ATX Case $359

拎來睇戲少打機 買r5 2400g都夠做 顯示卡都唔使買
除非你少打機嘅game係3a大作咁冇野講

quote.msg:
唔多打機, 但會用黎睇戲 (包括4k mkv), 所以揀AMD嘅display card, 請問以下list有冇需要執, 駛唔駛加到16GB ram? 謝謝!

AMD, Ryzen5 2600, 3.9GHz with Boost, 6 Cores/12 Threads UNLOCKED, 3MB/16MB Caches, AM4, Wraith Spire Cooler, 65W TDP, YD2600BBAFBOX $1365
ASRock B450M PRO4, B450, MATX, AM4, 4*DDR4,, $670
SAPPHIRE, AMD, RX 570 PULSE ( ITX ) V1, 4GB GDDR5 $1099
ADATA Premier 8GB (1 x 8GB) DDR4-2666(AD4U266638G19-R) $368
WD Red 2TB SATA3 NAS Hard Drives (WD20EFRX / 64MB Cache / IntelliPower)(紅版) $540
M.2 256GB ADATA SX8200 Pro PCIe3x4 SSD $525
Cooler Master MWE Gold 550/550W ATX Fully Modular PowerSupply,5 Years Warranty (80PLUS GOLD)(MPY-5501-AFAAG-UK) $629
Antec DP301m Tempered Glass Micro-ATX Case $359

replies.msg:
買火牛
- Cooler Master MWE Gold 550/550W ATX Fully Modular PowerSupply,5 Years Warranty (80PLUS GOLD)(MPY-5501-AFAAG-UK)
？倒不如升級做具零轉速風扇模式既全模組火牛啦，起碼方便砌/整機嘛。
若果火牛具零轉速風扇模式的話，我反而建議買高小小Watt數（例如850W），但最好唔買1000W或以上既火牛，因為咁樣就可能用超過5A既電流、有機會造成插座超負荷（家居用插座通常係13A或15A），同埋嗰啲火牛太長喇

Cooler Master既嘢流流哋，我都丟咗Cooler Master既ATX鋁機箱同GeminII S524散熱器啦

買顯示卡
- SAPPHIRE, AMD, RX 570 PULSE ( ITX ) V1, 4GB GDDR5
？算鳩數啦，慳番好過

2600配RX570用850W火牛做乜鳩呀
2600慳番張顯示卡係咪要插條HDMI入個腦睇野呀
